_header: God send us the dew of heaven gratia spiritus sancti
_description: Prayer to God for rain and fruitfulness, literally or spiritually — five long lines of macaronic verse with medial and end rhyme

BodDig172.First Lines:
God send vs þe dew of heuene gratiam spiritus sanctiAnd
                    reyn fro þe cloudes of heuene per doctrinam divini
                    verbi…
BodDig172.Last Lines:
…And bring forth a blome of sich feng and sich fuysounþat
                    be our bote and our savacioun i iesum filium dei vivi
BodDig172.Editions:
Macray,  William D. 
             Catalogi Codicum…Pars IX, Codices a… Kenelm Digby…,
                complectans.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1883: 179.
